classifications: {"title":"Weather forecast","category":"Info","steps":[{"fn_name":"getinput","followup":"Place name (city, zip code, country)?","variable_name":"@Location"},{"fn_name":"weather","variable_name":"@Location","units":"metric"}]}

{"title":"Leave Request","category":"Test","steps":[{"fn_name":"select","options":[{"name":"Vacation","value":"Vacation"},{"name":"Maternity Leave","value":"Maternity Leave"},{"name":"Sick Leave","value":"Sick Leave"},{"name":"Other","value":"Other"}]},{"fn_name":"getinput","followup":"What is the reason for the time off?","variable_name":"@RequestType"},{"fn_name":"getinput","followup":"When does your time off begin (mm/dd/yyyy)?","variable_name":"@StartDate","validator":{"fn":"validator.toDate(x) && validator.isAfter(x)","expect":"valid date format i.e. mm/dd/yyyy, older than today's date"}},{"fn_name":"getinput","followup":"How many days will you be gone for?","variable_name":"@Days","validator":{"fn":"validator.isInt(x, {min: 1, max: 90 })","expect":"Number of days between 1 and 90"}},{"fn_name":"compute","code":"var d=new Date('@StartDate'); d.setDate(d.getDate()+@Days); return((d.getMonth()+1)+'/'+d.getDate()+'/'+ d.getFullYear());","variable_name":"@EndDate"},{"fn_name":"output","message":"Ok, you are requesting to go on @RequestType from @StartDate and until @EndDate. Are you sure you want to submit this request?","style":"bold"},{"fn_name":"select","options":[{"name":"Yes","value":"Yes, I'm sure"},{"name":"No","value":"No, abort!"}]},{"fn_name":"condition","followup":"Are you sure?","conditions":[{"value":"Yes, I'm sure","gotostep":"_submit"},{"value":"*","gotostep":"_fin"}]},{"fn_name":"output","message":"Ok, you are requesting to go on @RequestType from @StartDate and until @EndDate. Are you sure you want to submit this request?","style":"bold"},{"id":"_submit","fn_name":"output","message":"Your request is being processed.","style":"bold"}]}

{"exclude_from_help":true,"steps":[{"fn_name":"output","message":"Following is a list of categories for this demo. Please select one to view the list of phrases I've been trained on. Saying a phrase will invoke a micro-app (a 'Zapp'). Please click on the link below to find out how to build your own catalog of micro-apps using the Capriza Designer","link":"http://www.capriza.com"},{"strict":true,"fn_name":"help_categories"},{"fn_name":"help_item","followup":"Category?"},{"fn_name":"throw"}]}

{"title":"Show the account team","category":"CS","steps":[{"name":"Get Account Name","fn_name":"getinput","followup":"Account Name?","variable_name":"@Account_Name"},{"name":"Account Team","fn_name":"sfquery","query":"SELECT Name, Owner.Name, CSM__r.Name, CSE__r.Name from Account WHERE Name LIKE '%@Account_Name%'","column_names":{"Name":"Account Name","Owner.Name":"RSM","CSM__r.Name":"CSM","CSE__r.Name":"CSE"}}]}

{"category":"CS","steps":[{"name":"Get Account Name","followup":"Which account?","fn_name":"getinput","variable_name":"@Account_Name"},{"name":"Get Contact Name","followup":"What is the contact last name?","fn_name":"getinput","variable_name":"@Contact_Name"},{"id":"_contacts","name":"Show Account Contacts","fn_name":"sfquery","max_rows":"3","query":"SELECT Account.Name, FirstName, LastName, Title, MobilePhone FROM Contact WHERE LastName LIKE '%@Contact_Name%' AND Account.Name LIKE '%@Account_Name%'","column_names":{"Account.Name":"Account Name","FirstName":"First Name","LastName":"Last Name","MobilePhone":"Mobile Phone"}}]}

{"category":"CS","steps":[{"name":"Top negtive needle movers per account","fn_name":"sfquery","query":"SELECT Account__r.Name, COUNT(Id) FROM Needle_Mover__c WHERE Pos_Neg__c = 'Negative' GROUP BY Account__r.Name ORDER BY COUNT(Id) DESC LIMIT 5","column_names":{"Account__r.Name":"Account Name","expr0":"Number of negative needle movers"}}]}

{"category":"Sales","steps":[{"name":"Top grossing reps for the year (by ARR)","fn_name":"sfquery","query":"SELECT Owner.Name, Sum(ARR__c) from Opportunity WHERE StageName IN ('08A - Closed Won','07A - Won') AND CloseDate = THIS_FISCAL_YEAR GROUP by Owner.Name ORDER BY Sum(TCV__c) DESC LIMIT 5","column_names":{"Owner.Name":"Rep","expr0":"ARR Booked"}}]}

{"category":"Sales","steps":[{"name":"Top 5 SDRs by completed meetings for the current quarter:","fn_name":"sfquery","query":"select SDR__r.name, count(id) from opportunity where Date_Meeting_Completed__c = THIS_FISCAL_QUARTER group by SDR__r.name order by count(id) desc LIMIT 5","column_names":{"Owner.Name":"SDR","expr0":"Completed meetings"}}]}

{"title":"Leave Request","category":"Test","steps":[{"fn_name":"select","options":[{"name":"Vacation","value":"Vacation"},{"name":"Maternity Leave","value":"Maternity Leave"},{"name":"Sick Leave","value":"Sick Leave"},{"name":"Other","value":"Other"}]},{"fn_name":"getinput","followup":"What is the reason for the time off?","variable_name":"@RequestType"},{"fn_name":"getinput","followup":"When does your time off begin (mm/dd/yyyy)?","variable_name":"@StartDate","validator":{"fn":"validator.toDate(x) && validator.isAfter(x)","expect":"valid date format i.e. mm/dd/yyyy, older than today's date"}},{"fn_name":"getinput","followup":"How many days will you be gone for?","variable_name":"@Days","validator":{"fn":"validator.isInt(x, {min: 1, max: 90 })","expect":"Number of days between 1 and 90"}},{"fn_name":"compute","code":"var d=new Date('@StartDate'); d.setDate(d.getDate()+@Days); return((d.getMonth()+1)+'/'+d.getDate()+'/'+ d.getFullYear());","variable_name":"@EndDate"},{"fn_name":"output","message":"Ok, you are requesting to go on @RequestType from @StartDate and until @EndDate. Are you sure you want to submit this request?","style":"bold"},{"fn_name":"select","options":[{"name":"Yes","value":"Yes, I'm sure"},{"name":"No","value":"No, abort!"}]},{"fn_name":"condition","followup":"Are you sure?","conditions":[{"value":"Yes, I'm sure","gotostep":"_submit"},{"value":"*","gotostep":"_fin"}]},{"fn_name":"output","message":"Ok, you are requesting to go on @RequestType from @StartDate and until @EndDate. Are you sure you want to submit this request?","style":"bold"},{"id":"_submit","fn_name":"output","message":"Your request is being processed.","style":"bold"}]}

{"title":"Show the account team","category":"CS","steps":[{"name":"Get Account Name","fn_name":"getinput","followup":"Account Name?","variable_name":"@Account_Name"},{"name":"Account Team","fn_name":"sfquery","query":"SELECT Name, Owner.Name, CSM__r.Name, CSE__r.Name from Account WHERE Name LIKE '%@Account_Name%'","column_names":{"Name":"Account Name","Owner.Name":"RSM","CSM__r.Name":"CSM","CSE__r.Name":"CSE"}}]}
